Safety

Safety

This page contains information about safety considerations and best practices when using this template.

Security Features

  • Content Security Policy: Implement proper CSP headers
  • Input Validation: Always validate user inputs
  • Authentication: Secure authentication mechanisms
  • Data Protection: Protect sensitive user data

Best Practices

  1. Regular Updates: Keep dependencies updated
  2. Code Reviews: Implement code review processes
  3. Testing: Comprehensive testing strategy
  4. Monitoring: Monitor for security issues

Resources

  • OWASP Security Guidelines
  • Astro Security Best Practices
